subject: Golf
PGA Championship
lead_paragraph: On Sunday, Phil Mickelson shot a final-round 69 in the P.G.A. Championship, did not make a bogey and said the problems with his wrist were behind him.
snippet: On Sunday, Phil Mickelson shot a final-round 69 in the P.G.A. Championship, did not make a bogey and said the problems with his wrist were behind him.
